name: timer-app
description: Daily Timer PWA with checkout functionality

scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.copy:frontend: cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/public/ || xcopy /E /I /Y frontend\dist backend\public
scripts.build:deploy: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:e2e
